meanings.definition: To comb or card (wool or flax) with a teasel.
meanings.sent1: She teaseled the wool to make it softer.
meanings.sent2: The farmer teaseled the flax before spinning it into linen.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten teaseled the yarn, creating a tangled mess.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers teaseled through the fabric, smoothing out any knots.
meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze teaseled the long grass in the meadow.

meanings.sent1: The teaseled fabric had a unique texture.
meanings.sent2: The teaseled surface of the plant provided a natural comb for passing animals.
meanings.sent3: The teaseled appearance of the sweater gave it a rustic charm.
meanings.sent4: The teaseled edges of the leaves caught the sunlight beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The teaseled stems added an interesting dimension to the garden.
